name: Learningfacts
0:
”Alexa, open learning facts”
”Alexa, let's open learning facts”
”Alexa, can you open learning facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learning facts
des:
Learning facts will give you knowledge about learning facts which are rolling over the internet.
Learning facts will give you facts by just saying open learning facts.
 it will generate a random fact every time the user requests a fact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
